title: Nvidia is buying more CoreWeave stock — this time it's in for $2 billion
full_text:
Nvidia is buying more CoreWeave stock — this time it's in for $2 billion. Nvidia is deepening its partnership with CoreWeave and making its biggest investment yet in the AI cloud company.. Nvidia is backing CoreWeave again.Patrick T. Fallon / AFP via Getty Images
  • CoreWeave said Nvidia is buying $2 billion worth of its stock.
  • The companies said Monday that they are expa… [+1374 chars]
